last_episode_to_air.name: California Here We Come
last_episode_to_air.overview: Paul and Karen contemplate the future as Karen receives an exciting new job offer. The Chubbys host a farewell party.

name: Benders
overview: Follows a team of friends bonded by an irrational obsession with their men's hockey team, The Chubbys. While their hockey skills may be limited, their passion is not, as shown by the chaos of their devotion to the game created in their everyday lives.

episodes.name: Choke
episodes.overview: Paul’s grandpa makes him an offer he can’t refuse.

episodes.name: Wake 'Em Up
episodes.overview: The guys gain a team sponsor while Paul tries to reschedule a family commitment. Karen shares a questionable new joke with her acupuncturist.

episodes.name: Prodigal Son
episodes.overview: Paul goes clean and sober in an attempt to one up Anthony in a new hockey division. Karen hosts a book club.

episodes.name: Fight Club
episodes.overview: The Chubbys crash Paul and Karen’s sick day at home while they deal with a disruptive neighbor.

episodes.name: The Sport of Kings
episodes.overview: The Chubbys get a new goalie with a promising business venture.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: Paul finds out Karen has a secret journal. Sebalos falls for a masseuse.

episodes.name: Nice Day for a Boat Ride
episodes.overview: Karen returns from Vegas with a pair of surprises for Paul. Anthony tries to tune out the noise of a new relationship.

episodes.name: California Here We Come
episodes.overview: Paul and Karen contemplate the future as Karen receives an exciting new job offer. The Chubbys host a farewell party.
